contentList.content: You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! Gain a +[2] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! Gain resistance to Fire and Cold damage. While standing in water, heal for [2] at the start of each turn.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! Gain [2] <LSTag Tooltip="TemporaryHitPoints">temporary hit points</LSTag>.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! Gain +[2] bonus damage.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! Your <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">movement speed</LSTag> is doubled, and you can take one additional action per turn.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]! You can see through magical and non-magical darkness, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
You can see through magical and non-magical darkness, and cannot be <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinded</LSTag>.
You're inspired by hearing the bard song [1]!
